showerReviews.reviewText: We come every year to a gala and this was our first time staying at this hotel and we were very impressed. Not only is a beautiful and clean hotel but all the employees were amazing. Very professional and friendly. You could tell they enjoy their jobs. Thank you for a great experience. We will be back!

AWESOME HOTEL! Beds are super comfortable! Room service is super sweet! The couch is nice, also in a completely separate room. Good variety on the TV. Hotel staff is friendly. The hotel is just very nice and clean, lobby i could definitely hang out in. And for the breakfast, they had a dude cooking omelets! 10/10 breakfast.
